subSubSection.paragraph:
Ancylosis larissae Bidzilya, Budashkin & Yepishin, 2019
— Zootaxa , 4657 (3): 449–451, figs 24–28, 30a, b, 49–50, 69. TL: Karadagh Nature Reserve, Crimea , Ukraine .

Material examined.
Russia :
3 ♂ , Tuva , Erzin distr. , Borig-Del ,
28.vi.1969
( Kostjuk ) (gen. slide 161/19, 31/20, O. Bidzilya ; 289.20, V . Yepishin )

Remarks.
Ancylosis larissae
was recently described from Eastern Crimea. The examined specimens from Russia , Kazakhstan , Afghanistan , Iran , Mongolia and China fall into the range of external variation of this species and match it in the genitalia of both sexes. These records justify broad distribution of
A. larissae
in the Palaearctic region.
